en_text: I wrote a lot about him in my diary, too.
jp_text:
日記にも 長谷君のことばかり
書いてあるんだけど―

en_text: I thought the same thing.
jp_text:
同じことの繰り返し
ただリセットを繰り返してる
google_translated:
Repeat the same thing
Just repeat the reset

en_text: But... But by being near her, \NI felt that Fujimiya-san's memories
jp_text: でも それでも…

en_text: were somehow remaining within her, \Nbuilding upon one another.
jp_text:
確実に藤宮さんの中に
思い出は残ってて―

en_text: No matter what anyone says, \NFujimiya-san and I are friends!
jp_text:
何も進まないことは
分かっているから―
google_translated:
What does nothing go proceeding
Because I know-

en_text: So I'll repeat that week again.
jp_text: 俺は また１週間を繰り返す

en_text: I'll become her friend from the beginning again,
jp_text: また最初から友達になっていく
google_translated: I will be friends from the beginning

en_text: praying that a good future for Fujimiya-san
jp_text: いいものになることを祈って
google_translated: Pray that it will be good

en_text: kaisatsu no mae tsunagu te to te
jp_text: 行き着く先が―
